events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund since it cannot be exchanged.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to customer's request for money back on a wrong order.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect order delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so I can verify the issue?
I have attached a photo of the wrong item and included my order number as you requested to assist in processing the refund.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and resolution offer. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon.
We have completed the refund process on our end. You should see the amount credited back to your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and prompt service.
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing this case now but feel free to reach out any time in the future.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
I completed the survey and rated the support as excellent. Thank you again for your assistance!
The refund case has been archived as resolved and closed after customer feedback was received.
